alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 11:47AM EST until December 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Thu 11 am: 8.4 Forecast: Thu 1 pm 8.3 Thu 7 pm 8.2 Fri 1 am 8.0 Fri 7 am 7.7 Fri 1 pm 7.4 Fri 7 pm 7.2 Sat 1 am 6.9 Sat 7 am 6.7 Sat 1 pm 6.5 Sat 7 pm 6.3 Sun 1 am 6.2 Sun 7 am 6.0 &&
